business.pricing: Express photo appraisal $175; full USPAP-compliant documentation priced individually.

content.about: Colorado Springs Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Colorado Springs area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Emily B.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: David M.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Jessica M.
reviews.content: The antique appraisal was thorough, but I found their pricing a bit high compared to others.

business.pricing: Single-item opinions from $125; multi-piece engagements receive tailored pricing.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Colorado Springs provides professional antique appraisal services in the Colorado Springs area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Patricia R.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Sarah D.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: David T.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.
